title: Weavers Way Co-op - Chestnut Hill
description: Stocks fresh, local and organic fruit and produce, baked goods, bulk grains and spices, nuts, dried fruit and a vast selection of both mainstream and hard-to-find grocery items. Sells an abundance of vegan items. Also has a deli, a prepared foods department with dozens of hot and cold entrees, made-to-order sandwiches, and a salad bar, as well as an oatmeal bar and other breakfast specialties every morning.
